item.title: Box Score Quick
item.description: Box Score Quick Languages/Technologies: React, Python, Flask, Heroku, MongoDB (previously) For NBA fanatics, who want to watch interesting games or just get real-time box scores quick and easy. All box scores for every game all on a single page. Read more here and here for an update. Check it out here. Github (frontend) Github (backend)
